lyrics:
"Don't Trust" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Don't Trust" (feat. Young Scooter) [Verse 1:] Bricksquad bachelors cookers, we get extras Say that that's your bitch but nigga we did ask ya Spent 10 Million dollars of VVS's Woke up in Texas, he text me, I start flexing Diamonds chains sexy, my pistol is my best friend I haven't killed in so many years, I get rusty Hustling, my 40 keep buldging in on the justice These scary niggas calling the cops, but I ain't touched them Finessed em, tricked them, leopards, that's on Simpson Impress them, a victim, another lead hit successful My weapon, F it, Join em you wanna help em And since you said you looking for Gucci, I'm on Gresham [Hook:] Don't trust me, I'll take some, I'll take some, I'll take some Don't trust me, I'll take some, I'll take some, I'll take some Don't trust him, he'll take some, he'll take some, we'll take some Don't trust us, I'll take some, I'll take some, I'll take some [Verse 2:] Worth for couple mill, still I take some 24 hours, got the base running Sale swag bags, I got freights coming Sale you swag pack, take it back from you Them diamonds round your wrist, cause you a lot of problems You scared you tuck ya ice, cause you don't want no problems These young niggas out here hungry, they say it's no more starving Finessing jewelry season, everybody robbing Don't trust me, cause I'm from the streets Going drug shoppin, cop a couple of keys I finesse the plug, when we don't agree Dummy bank rolls, send em over seas [Hook:] Don't trust me, I'll take some, I'll take some, I'll take some Don't trust me, I'll take some, I'll take some, I'll take some Don't trust him, he'll take some, he'll take some, we'll take some Don't trust us, I'll take some, I'll take some, I'll take some [Verse 3:] Ya'll niggas know how I move, y'all niggas know what it do Versace frames on my face, I'm a 4 eyeded fool If I should blue with your boo, pay mine to do on my coupe A quarter brick for the booze, at least a 4 and a deuce You know I shoot through my jacket, you call the troops for your truce Full metal jacket a savage, I put 3 mill on your crew The world grenade in the room, watch all your partners kaboom I'm a so icy tycoon, got 2 balloons in my True's Is you gon hoe up or blow up? Is you gonn grow up or throw up Cause I got dojos to roll up and I might pour us a 4 I can't drive a Corolla, roll around in a roller That's a drop in Rolls Royce, y'all niggas act like you know us [Hook:] Don't trust me, I'll take some, I'll take some, I'll take some Don't trust me, I'll take some, I'll take some, I'll take some Don't trust him, he'll take some, he'll take some, we'll take some Don't trust us, I'll take some, I'll take some, I'll take some if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
'+ ''+ '
'); } Submit Corrections Thanks to Trey Cape for correcting these lyrics. Writer(s): Radric Davis, Joshua Howard Luellen, Young Scooter AZLyrics G Gucci Mane Lyrics mixtape: "Trap God" (2012) Intro Head Shots Money Habits Crazy Get Money Nigga Rolly Up Fuck The World Act Up Never See That's That Servin Shooter Dead Man Baby Wipes Don't Trust Suckaz Gas And Mud Fuck Something I Fuck With That Get Lost Truth(iTunes Bonus Track) Search
title: Don't Trust Lyrics | AZLyrics.com
